contentList.content: Way of the Wanderer
You use your ki to enhance your senses and blur the boundaries between yourself, the natural world, and others.
You use your ki to enhance your senses and blur the boundaries between yourself, the natural world, and others.
Way of the Wanderer
Recall Austerities

Use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> and 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to recall your harsh training in extreme environments, steeling yourself for what may be to come. You receive a 1d4 bonus on saving throws for the next 10 turns.
Sentience Link

Use 3 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to create a mental link with all sentient creatures, enabling communication with animals and reading the thoughts of more intelligent beings.
Calm Creature
Use 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to placate the mind of an animal for 10 rounds.
Moonsight
The wanderer has learned to perpetually circulate her ki to boost her senses, imparting her with permanent superior darkvision.
Pounce
Focus ki into the legs to triple jumping distance for 10 rounds for 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag>.
Mosswalker

Weave ki into the immediate surroundings, subtly warping the perception of outside observers. This technique uses 2 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> and provides you with a +10 bonus to Stealth checks until your next Long Rest.
Shifting Presence
Use 2 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to change all aspects of your appearance until your next Long Rest.
Hagakure
Use 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to suppress your ki, immediately becoming Invisible if you are obscured.
Mistrider
Use 2 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to 'walk' through folds of ki in your immediate environment, teleporting to a location within sight.
Sense Vitals

Use 3 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to sense the weak points of a target, dealing an additional 1d6 points of Physical damage whenever you hit it with a weapon attack. If the target dies before the spell ends, you can use Reapply Sense Vitals to mark a new creature.
Discerning Senses

For 4 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag>, the wanderer can dramatically enhance her awareness until her next Long Rest, giving her Advantage on Perception, Insight, and Survival checks, making her immune to being Surprised, and enabling her to perceive invisible entities.
Beguiling Persona

Spend 2 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to subtly boost your expressions and mannerisms, giving you Advantage on all Charisma checks. This technique is not considered a spell and never provokes hostility.
Hypnotic Pattern
Use 4 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to mesmerize creatures that can see you for two rounds.
Vital Overflow
Use 4 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki</LSTag> to flood nearby plants with vital energy and cause them to grow rapidly, quartering the movement of those who pass through them.
Precision Throwing
The wanderer is able to throw with considerable finesse, and can use her Dexterity modifier instead of Strength modifier for to-hit attack rolls when throwing objects.
Blindsight
The wanderer has further developed their senses, and can now operate normally in all forms of darkness, including magical darkness and blindness.
Wilderness Ascetic
Wanderers are proficient in the Nature and Survival skills.
Ki Projection
For 1 Ki, project your ki a short distance away, creating a sensory effect that compels nearby creatures to investigate, like the cantrip Minor Illusion.
